title: PGIMER Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for Project Research Scientist II Posts
description: Postgraduate Institute of Medical Education and Research (PGIMER) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Project Research Scientist II Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the Post Graduation, M.Sc., can grab this chance and apply for the PGIMER Recruitment 2025 . Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply b...
